name: Monosodium glutamate
foods: Variety of foods as a flavour enhancer. Cured and processed meats, noodles.
notice: Adverse effects appear in some asthmatic people, not permitted in foods for infants and young children; typical products are canned vegetables.
info: Derived from a naturally-occuring amino acid. Commercially produced by the fermentation of bacteria or by its isolation from plant proteins.
